verb.description: Cause (a liquid) to be ejected from a small opening in a thin, fast stream or jet.
examples: she squirted soda into a glass

verb.description: Transmit (information) in highly compressed or speeded-up form.

noun.description: A thin stream or small quantity of liquid ejected from something.
A person perceived to be insignificant, impudent, or presumptuous.
examples: what did he see in this patronizing little squirt?

noun.description: A compressed radio signal transmitted at high speed.
